about_the_game:
Story

Kei had retired from her magical girl activities due to the monotony of her daily life.
However, to defeat the increasingly powerful villains, she reluctantly resumes her magical girl duties.
As her popularity rises through live streaming, Kei grows stronger and begins to sense something strange about the villains. To uncover the truth, she starts her investigation.

Gameplay

  • The game is composed of a main story and sub-stories.
  • In the main story, Kei’s chaotic adventures to uncover the truth behind the town are depicted, while the sub-stories introduce her charming and dependable allies who assist her.
  • On days when there are no villain invasions, Kei lives her life as a college student, typically working part-time or gathering information about the villains.
  • Part-time jobs and information gathering are carried out in five different areas. Kei can choose two areas to visit per day.
  • Each area holds unique information and offers part-time jobs that are only available there.
  • By interacting with various objects, Kei can gain an advantage in her battles against the villains.

Combat System

  • When villains invade, Kei transforms into Revantia to fight them.
  • Before starting the battle, Revantia sets up a live streaming session. To do this, she selects equipment like cameras and lighting, which directly affect the battle.
  • During the battle, viewers (listeners) join in. They are divided into good and bad listeners, each of whom becomes excited by specific actions Revantia takes.
  • Good and bad listeners send positive and negative “hearts” to Revantia. These hearts enhance her attack and defense.
  • When Revantia takes damage, her mental health decreases. If her mental health reaches zero, she is overwhelmed by the villains.
  • To break free from being overwhelmed, Revantia must resist, and if she fails, a combat H-event occurs.
  • The outcome of the combat H-event changes depending on how much Revantia has physically or mentally succumbed to the villains.

Whether you witness the boundless heroics of a righteous magical girl or the disgrace of a pleasure-addicted sow depends on your choices.

  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Kei, a retired magical girl, resumes her duties to defeat powerful villains while balancing her college life. Through streaming, she gains strength and investigates the villains' mysteries. The game features exploration, part-time jobs, and a unique combat system influenced by viewer interactions.
